scripts.install: yarn install:app && yarn install:api && yarn install:contracts && yarn install:chainlink:node && yarn install:chainlink:adapters && yarn install:copyfiles
scripts.install:app: git clone https://github.com/octobay/app && cd app && yarn
scripts.install:api: git clone https://github.com/octobay/api && cd api && yarn
scripts.install:contracts: git clone https://github.com/octobay/contracts && cd contracts && yarn
scripts.install:chainlink:node: git clone https://github.com/smartcontractkit/chainlink && cd chainlink && git checkout tags/v0.9.4 && make install
scripts.install:copyfiles: cp app/.env.sample app/.env && cp contracts/.env.sample contracts/.env && cp .env.chainlink.sample chainlink/.env && cp -rf chainlink-adapters/jobs ./.jobs
scripts.evm:deploy: rm -rf contracts/build/contracts && node pre-deploy && cd contracts && truffle migrate --f 1 --to 3 --network development && cd .. && yarn chainlink:jobs:create && cd .evm && truffle migrate --f 4 --to 5 --network development && cd .. && node post-deploy
scripts.chainlink:adapters: node configure-adapters && cd chainlink-adapters && yarn start
